Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Narragansett/Between George-Diversey
ShortDescription: SB #86 buses are rerouted via Narragansett, Belmont, Austin, Diversey & Narragansett: due to, street blockage near Narragansett/Between George-Diversey.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Belmont, Austin, Diversey and Narragansett: due to, street blockage near Narragansett/Between George-Diversey.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

ShortDescription: Southbound 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Montrose and Cicero: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Irving Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Montrose and Cicero: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Irving Park.

Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute near 119th/Michigan
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses temp. rerouted SB: 95th, Michigan, 115th, Halsted & 127th; NB: 127th, Halsted, 115th & Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 119th/Michigan, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via 95th, Michigan, 115th, Halsted and 127th.

Northbound buses will operate via 127th, Halsted, 115th and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute near 119th/Michigan
ShortDescription: 119 Michigan/119th buses temp. rerouted SB: Michigan, 115th, State, & 119th; NB: 119th, State, 118th Pl & Michigan, due to street blockage near 119th/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 119th/Michigan, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, 115th, State, and 119th.

Northbound buses will operate via 119th, State, 118th Pl and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.
